H0.text: Which Italian city is known as the pizza capital of the world. Rome

H1.text: Which Italian city is known as the pizza capital of the world. Milan

H2.text: Which Italian city is known as the pizza capital of the world. Turin

H3.text: Which Italian city is known as the pizza capital of the world. Neapel

A4.text: Naples is traditionally credited as the home of pizza.

A5.text: The city hosts an eleven-day festival dedicated to this iconic dish.

A6.text: Neapolitan pizza is the version of the round pizza typically prepared in the Italian city of Naples

A7.text: The art of its making (arte del pizzaiolo napoletano) is included on UNESCO's list of intangible cultural heritage
